message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is about Natural Language Processing (NLP) and focuses on learning rich representations from semantic tasks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses a hierarchical model and multi-task learning, which are common techniques in machine learning and deep learning, respectively. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also likely categories. The paper also deals with Named Entity Recognition and Entity Mention Detection, which are related to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper does not use external NLP tools like syntactic parsers, which suggests that it may also be relevant to cs.CV (Computer Vision) as it deals with learning representations directly from data.
